abstract: Authorities in Spanish territory of Ceuta in North Africa arrest four men suspected of belonging to militant Islamist network that may have been planning an attack in Spain.
lead_paragraph: Spain’s Interior Ministry said the police in its North African enclave arrested four men suspected of belonging to a militant Islamist network that may have been planning an attack.
snippet: Spain’s Interior Ministry said the police in its North African enclave arrested four men suspected of belonging to a militant Islamist network that may have been planning an attack.

headline.main: Police Arrest 4 in North Africa Amid Fears of Attack in Spain
headline.print_headline: Police Arrest 4 in North Africa Amid Fears of Attack in Spain
